import React, {useState} from "react"; import "../App.css" import HomePage from "../assets/svg/homepage.svg" import { Collapse, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, Nav, Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarText, NavbarToggler, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown } from "reactstrap"; import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom"; export const NavbarMenu = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) let history = useHistory() const pathname = history.location.pathname const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
Maps About authors Options Option 1 Option 2 Reset
